## 3. DESCRIPTION (Final Public Copy ‚Äî Plain Text)
Neon light hums softly outside the window.
Rain streaks slide down the glass.
A CRT monitor glows steadily in a quiet room built for focus.
This 3-hour LoFi and Synthwave mix is designed for deep night coding, studying, writing, and long creative work sessions. Warm analog textures, restrained rhythms, and subtle rain ambience create an immersive nighttime workspace without distraction.
The energy stays calm and consistent, evolving gently from early night focus into deep midnight flow.
All music is royalty free and safe for content creators.
Best for:
- Late-night coding and development
- Studying and deep focus
- Writing and creative work
- Quiet night productivity
Aesthetic:
Neon rain glow ‚Ä¢ CRT terminal text ‚Ä¢ analog desk gear ‚Ä¢ warm interior lamp ‚Ä¢ cool city reflections ‚Ä¢ focused night atmosphere
## 4. VISUAL DESIGN (Image + Animation Instructions)
### Chosen Image Style
Retro CRT coding desk ‚Ä¢ glowing monochrome CRT text (green or teal) ‚Ä¢ analog synth gear ‚Ä¢ cassette or reel-to-reel accent ‚Ä¢ plants framing the desk ‚Ä¢ rain-streaked window ‚Ä¢ neon city light reflections (subtle, not cyberpunk) ‚Ä¢ warm interior lamp vs cool exterior light ‚Ä¢ high clarity for thumbnail readability
### AI Prompt
Cozy retro nighttime coding desk inspired by late-80s and early-90s technology, cinematic composition with slight angled perspective. Large CRT monitor centered on desk displaying clear glowing terminal text. Analog synth gear and cassette decks on desk, warm desk lamp lighting. Large window behind desk with rain streaks and soft neon city light reflections, dark blue and purple night tones. Plants framing the scene, subtle haze, soft shadows, clean readable shapes, calm focused atmosphere.
### Animation Notes
- Gentle rain streak movement on window
- Subtle CRT flicker (very low intensity)
- Interior lamp glow breathing slowly
- No camera movement
- No harsh reflections or glare
